text: 17:14 Jeremaia 50:44-45; 1 Timoti 6:15; Akar Mogomem 16:14; 19:19Egh me Sipsipɨn Nguzim ko mɨsogham, eghtɨ Sipsipɨn Nguzim me gasɨghasɨgh me abɨragham. Gumazamizir Sipsipɨn Nguzim ko itiba, God me amɨsevegha, men diazɨma me guizɨn akamɨn gɨn ghua tuivigha gavgavigha mɨdorozir kam gami. Sipsipɨn Nguzim, a guizbangɨra Gumazamizir Ekiabar Gumazir Ekiam ko Atrivibar Atrivir Ekiam. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, a me abɨragham.”
